question_text: Which VLAN configuration would allow devices on different VLANs to communicate with each other?
answer_options: Enable inter-VLAN routing with a router or layer 3 switch
Assign the same VLAN ID to all devices
Disable trunk ports on all switches
Configure each port as an access port
correct_answer: Enable inter-VLAN routing with a router or layer 3 switch
explanation: Inter-VLAN routing allows communication between devices on separate VLANs via a router or layer 3 switch.
